item.title: Fly tipping at Greening Street bus stop on Mcleod Road, 18th December
item.description:
Fly tipping of bag full of alcohol cans that appear to be empty. Continual fly tippingbat this bus stop and join bin at bus stop so peoplenusjng bus stop just dump their rubbish at bus stop, on path, in people's gardens, on their walls and continual. Royal Borough Greenwich and Envirocrime keep being informed and nothingbdonendeapitwnbejng told a bin would be put back that was removed. It is now ridiculous and health hazards to local residents as itnis alcohol and previously been used nappies rubbish etc. Please reinstate bins at busnstopsnalong McLeod Road as residents should notnhave tondeal with rubbish dumped at bus stops and infront ofntheir houses, on walls amd thrownnjn our gardens due to bin being removed. Also continual dumping of cigarettes bitts also and just disgusting. Alsonpeollencokingbjnto gardens to dumpninnour bins and wrong rubbish in our bins as result and tresspassnontonour properties whdue to ko bin at bus stopnor whn we put our binsnoutnfor rubbish collections and not fair on residents as we get wrong rubbish labels on our bins and rubbish not taken. Continual problems and no-one doing anything about it. I previously reported dumped used baby nappiesnthrownnjn my garden, alcohol used and half full rubbish food waste electrical goods etc and nothing done.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mcleod Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Jenner road is so littered, 18th December
item.description:
Jenner road is an absolute mess, litter strewn about the street, recycling bags missed by the bin men and general fly tipping of rubbish all down the street. We regularly litter pick the area but cannot keep on top of it. Please remove all fly tipped items

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooke Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet
